CustomerInvoice.description: The CustomerInvoices array cannot be null but can be an empty array.

InvoiceId.description:
Maps to the field SalesInvoices.SalesInvoiceId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

InvoiceDate.description:
Maps to the field SalesInvoices.EffectiveDate in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

DueDate.description:
Maps to the field SalesInvoices.DueDate in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

Status.description:
A calculated value from the fields SalesInvoices.CurInvoiceValueOutstanding and SalesInvoices.DueDate in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: allowed

InvoiceTotal.description:
Maps to the field SalesInvoices.CurInvoiceValue in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed

OutstandingBalance.description:
Maps to the field SalesInvoices.CurInvoiceValueOutstanding in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: allowed
